title: Metrics Enhancements
short-description: Performance improvements and new SPL commands.

title: Updated UI Look and Feel
short-description: Modern look and feel to the Splunk Enterprise user interface.

title: Machine Learning Toolkit 3.1 and 3.2
short-description: Introducing new pre-processing options FieldSelector, new clustering algorithm: X-Means, revamped Model and Experiment Management Framework and few other configuration options.

title: Splunk Component Monitoring via REST Endpoints
short-description: Proactively monitor health of Splunk components via REST endpoints

title: Rolling upgrade of indexer cluster and search head cluster
short-description: Rolling upgrade of indexer cluster and search head cluster with minimal search disruption

title: Searchable rolling restart of indexer cluster and search head cluster
short-description: Rolling restart of indexer cluster and search head cluster members sequentially with minimal search disruption.

title: Manual detention of search head cluster member
short-description: Remove search head cluster member gracefully by putting the member in manual detention to allow completion of in-progress searches. Any new scheduled searches are redirected to other search head cluster members.

title: Splunk Connect for Kafka
short-description: Scalable ingest for events and metrics from Apache Kafka into Splunk, using a new Kafka sink connector to Splunk.

title: AWS Kinesis Firehose integration
short-description: Scalable ingest for events and metrics from AWS Kinesis to Splunk using Firehose integration.

title: Diagnostic UI
short-description: User interface for generating diagnostic files from Splunk instances across a distributed deployment
